text: Jack A. Deloplaine (April 21, 1954 â€“ August 3, 2022) was an American professional football player. He was a running back for four seasons in the National Football League (NFL). He played for the Pittsburgh Steelers, Washington Redskins, and Chicago Bears from 1976 to 1979. He was born in Pottstown, Pennsylvania. Deloplaine died on August 3, 2022 in Columbia, South Carolina at the age of 68. ==References== Category:1954 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American football running backs Category:Pittsburgh Steelers players Category:Washington Redskins players Category:Chicago Bears players Category:Sportspeople from Pittsburgh
title: Jack Deloplaine
